Description: Body sherd of North Ionian pottery bowl; interior glazed streaky black (fired brown) with some added white and red bands at top of sherd, and white bands at bottom; exterior: wide black (fired streaky red) band, reserved above below; inscription on exterior. Very micaceous clay.
Bibliographic references: Petrie 1886 / Naukratis. Part I., 1884-85 (pl. XXXIII, no. 348)
Bernand 1970 / Le Delta égyptien d'après les textes grecs, i: les confins libyques (p. 672, no. 309)
Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GG.258)
